title: Software Engineer, Instagram
description: Build and scale features for the Instagram platform.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field
3+ years of experience in software development
Proficiency in Python, Java, or C++
responsibilities: Design, develop, and deploy new features for Instagram
Participate in code reviews and system design discussions

title: Product Manager, Reality Labs
description: Lead product development for AR/VR experiences and hardware within Reality Labs.
requirements: Bachelor's degree or equivalent practical experience
5+ years of experience in product management
Experience with AR/VR technologies or gaming
responsibilities: Define product strategy and roadmap for AR/VR products
Collaborate with engineering, research, and design teams
Drive product launches and user adoption

title: Data Scientist, Facebook Ads
description: Apply data science techniques to optimize Facebook's advertising platform.
requirements: Master's or PhD in a quantitative field
3+ years of experience in data science or analytics
Proficiency in SQL and Python or R
responsibilities: Analyze large datasets to identify trends and insights
Build predictive models for ad performance
Communicate findings to business and engineering teams

title: Research Scientist, AI
description: Conduct cutting-edge research in artificial intelligence and contribute to open-source projects.
requirements: PhD in AI, Machine Learning, or related field
Strong publication record in top-tier conferences
Proficiency in Python and deep learning frameworks (e.g., PyTorch)
responsibilities: Propose and conduct novel AI research
Publish research papers and present at conferences
Collaborate with academic and industry partners

title: Software Engineer, WhatsApp
description: Develop and scale features for the WhatsApp messaging platform.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field
3+ years of experience in software development
responsibilities: Design and implement new features for WhatsApp
Ensure high availability and reliability of services
Work with cross-functional teams to deliver product improvements
